pr_title: feat: Move probe builders to ProbeGenerator class

timeline.message:
feat: Move probe builders to abstractmodel

Probe builders for now belong in abstractmodel
This will allow for non static referencing in future
changes.
ModelUtils whilst useful is an antipattern that encourages
large code groupings.

Signed-off-by: Samuel Hawker <samuel.hawker@ibm.com>

feat: ProbeGenerator class

From review comments, move logic to new independent class
with static constructor method and varying generator methods
for repeated calls if necessary.

Signed-off-by: Samuel Hawker <samuel.hawker@ibm.com>

feat: Re-add static probe creation

The builders are now part of the underlying implementation
static creators have now been added as a short hand for
building each of the probe types
+ added tests

Signed-off-by: Samuel Hawker <samuel.hawker@ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: This is really what my concern with regards to the memory was. If you are sure it has no impact I'm fine. I admit that  I have no clue how things like memory work in Java or any other language :-o.
